title: Taylor Bennett Interview and More
itunes:title: Taylor Bennett Interview and More
description:
Monday 8/6- After a video went viral of brawl that broke out at a Brooklyn nail salon, all because the customer did not like her brow job, we opened up the phone lines to see how our listeners would handle getting terrible customer service. Moreover, Taylor Bennett who also is Chance the Rapper's brother stopped by, where he spoke about his new EP, opening up about his sexuality, being compared to his brother and more. Also, Charlamagne gives "Donkey of the Day" to people reusing condoms. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
